level.heading: In general
level.text: A civil action may be brought:
By a participant or beneficiary to enforce or clarify rights to benefits from the Trust Fund or Federal Supplemental Fund under this chapter;
To enforce any claim arising (in whole or in part) under this chapter or the contract; or

To recover benefits improperly paid from the Trust Fund or Federal Supplemental Fund or to clarify a participant's or beneficiary's rights to benefits from the Trust Fund or Federal Supplemental Fund; and
By the Secretary to enforce any provision of this chapter or the contract.

level.heading: Treatment of Trust Fund
level.text: The Trust Fund may sue and be sued as an entity.

level.heading: Exclusive remedy
level.text: This subchapter shall be the exclusive means for bringing actions against the Trust Fund, the Trustee, or the Secretary under this chapter.
